Serving Time: 4:30 PM \u2013 6:30 PM   When: Every 2nd, 3rd, 4th, and 5th Thursday of the month   Please Note:   We do not serve on: 1st Thursdays of the month   November 27 (Thanksgiving),  December 25 (Christmas),   January 1 (New Year\u2019s Day)   All are welcome!    No smoking allowed on property.", "notes": "Cafe Manna serves a hot meal on the 2nd, 3rd, 4th and 5th Thursdays of the month.  We do not serve on the 1st Thursday of the month.    No Cafe Manna on
